column2: A string transformer that does not replace or escape all occurrences of a meta-character may be ineffective.
column4: This does not escape backslash characters in the input.

column1: Shell command built from environment values
column2: Building a shell command string with values from the enclosing environment may cause subtle bugs or vulnerabilities.
column4: This shell command depends on an uncontrolled [["absolute path"|"relative:///lib/open.js:50:26:50:34"]].

column1: Unsafe shell command constructed from library input
column2: Using externally controlled strings in a command line may allow a malicious user to change the meaning of the command.
column4: [["String concatenation"|"relative:///lib/open.js:58:15:58:50"]] based on library input is later used in [["shell command"|"relative:///lib/open.js:58:10:58:61"]].
